title: CryptoWatch
summary: The cleanest Bitcoin price ticker watch face and ticker complication!

descriptionHTML:
A clean and minimalistic android wear watch face that provides you with the latest Bit- or altcoin price index! In addition it features a Portfolio and CoinMarketCap Watch app to stay up to date from your wrist.

⌚ - Features
- Watchface with price ticker
- Portfolio watch app & complication support
- Ticker complication support (use cryptowatch with other watchfaces on Android Wear 2.0)
- Coin Market Cap rankings watch app
- AM/PM mode
- Discrete mode (hide currency symbol)
- Customizable token, exchange, currency & colors
- Auto price refresh or force refresh by clicking

📱 - Features
- Portfolio
- Ticker homescreen widgets
- Portfolio homescreen widget
- CoinMarketCap rankings
- Token detail page with historic chart data [in beta] and link to projects
- Watch face configuration screen
- Tasker (external app) support: retrieve prices into Tasker variables

Currently CryptoWatch supports the following coins:
Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP), Ethereum Classic (ETC), Nem (XEM), Litecoin (LTC), Dash (DASH), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), Bitshares (BTS), Stratis (STRAT), Monero (XMR), Waves (WAVES), Bytecoin (BCN), Steem (STEEM), Zcash (ZEC), Lisk (LSK), Siacoin (SC), Steller Lumens (XLM), Game Credits (GAME), Dogecoin (DOGE), Golem (GNT), Gnosis (GNO), Factom (FCT), MaidSafeCoin (MAID), Nxt (NXT), Ardor (ARDR), DigixDAO (DGD), Digibyte (DGB), Bitconnect (BCC), Decred (DCR), Augur (REP), Byteball (GBYTE), Iconomi (ICN), Komodo (KMD), SingularDTV (SNGLS), Tether (USDT), Aragon (ANT), SysCoin (SYS), FirstBlood (1ST), Ubiq (UBQ), AntShares (ANS), Neo (NEO), Pivx (PIVX), BitcoinDark (BTCD), Ark (ARK), Melon (MLN), ReddCoin (RDD), Lykke (LKK), Wings (WINGS), iExec RLC (RLC), Storjcoin X (SJCX), (BNT), LBRY Credits (LBC), Groestlcoin (GRS), EOS (EOS), Status (SNT), MCAP (MCAP), TenX (PAY), Qtum (QTUM), OmiseGo (OMG), Populous (PPT), Metal (MTL), Metaverse ETP (ETP), Civic (CBC), Bytom (BTM), Storj (STORJ), Gas (GAS), Binance Coin (BNB), FunFair (FUN), district0x (DNT), Nexus (NXS), Particl (PART), Pillar (PLR), DECENT (DCT), Asch (XAS), Edgeless (EDG), Cofound.it (CFI), Safe Exchange Coin (SAFEX), Elastic (XEL), Blocknet (BLOCK), Stox (STX), LEOcoin (LEO), Numeraire (NMR), NoLimitCoin (NLC2), Etheroll (DICE), I/O Coin (IOC), Rialto (XRL), adToken (ADT), Monaco (MCO), Bitdeal (BDL), AdEx (ADX), FirstCoin (FRST), Tierion (TNT), Rise (RISE), Vertcoin (VTC), Synereo (AMP), StartCoin (START), MonaCoin (MONA), Cardano (ADA), ZenCash (ZEN), Bitcoin Gold (BTG), Electroneum (ETN), PinkCoin (PINK), CannaCoin (CCN), HempCoin (THC), Walton (WTC), DeepOnion (ONION), Achain (ACT), ZCoin (XZC), Exchange Union (XUC), SALT (SALT), Power Ledger (POWR), Raiden Network Token (RDN), TRON (TRX), Kyber Network (KNC), Aeternity (AE), Ethos (ETHOS), Pura (PURA), Cryptonex (CNX), Einsteinium (EMC2), MinexCoin (MNX), Quantstamp (QSP), Substratum (SUB), Streamr DATAcoin (DATA), Santiment Network Token (SAN), VeChain (VEN), PotCoin (POT), Red Pulse (RPX), PLNcoin (PLNC), Tezos (XTZ), Bitcoin Diamond (BCD), Bitcore (BTX), Pirl (PIRL), QASH (QASH), Decentraland (MANA), Burst (BURST)

Exchanges: Coinmarketcap, Bitstamp, Bittrex, Poloniex, Coinbase, Wex, Gdax, Kraken, Coincap, MercadoBitcoin. (not all pairs supported at every exchange)

Don't like the design? No worries! This watch face also exposes the prices to any other watch face that supports the new Android Wear 2.0 complication system!

Set up your portfolio using phone app to monitor it on both your Watch & Phone!

Your token not supported? Please send an email with your request and I'll see what I can do!
comments: Love the Android Wear integration. Please consider removing the decimal points for the ticker complications. It makes the text very small and the decimals are insignificant.

I like the app very much, I only use the complication and it does the job. However I guess it's updating too often because the battery does not last throughout the day anymore. Can you please add an option to modify the update rate of the complication? Thank you!
Hey man, love it so far. Thank you for adding TRAC! However, I now have problems with Oyster Pearl (PRL), it seems to be removed?

Hey there! I'm loving this app! Just what I needed, thank you for writing it.  One request - if possible, could you please increase (or offer an option) the font size of the complications on the watch face? The numbers are extremely tiny and my eyesight isn't what is used to be :) (Huawei Watch)  Great app! A+!
All coins are listed in dollar on the watch app, any way to change this to euro?
Only good for the watch widgets, there are better portfolio apps out there
recentChanges: - Added coins: Nano, Zilliqa, Polymath, IOStoken, Bitcoin Atom, ShareX, Qube, Bitclave, Swisscoin, SwissBorg, Garlicoin, OriginTrail
